description: Roof extension to main rear roof slope; rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 20/494/LP/01 (Location Plan), 20/494/E/01 (Existing First & Roof Plans), 20/494/E/02 (Existing West & South Elevations), 20/494/E/03 (Existing Section 1-1 & 2-2), 20/494/E/04 (Existing Street Elevation), 20/494/P/01 Revision A (Proposed First, Second & Roof Plans), 20/494/P/02 Revision A (Proposed West & South Elevations), 20/494/P/03 Revision A (Proposed Section 1-1 & 2-2) and 20/494/P/04 (Proposed Street Elevation).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the front roof slope of the dwelling shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policy D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
